abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column discusses three loose factions that make up Islamic State, which include volunteers, losers and misfits, local Sunni leaders and true ideologues; suggests that to defeat group its leadership must be wiped out, Muslims must be enlisted to discredit extremist versions of Islam, injustice and state failure in region must be ended and autonomous region for Iraqi Sunnis must be carved out.
lead_paragraph: The murderous ways of the Islamic State are no joke, but the Italians’ mocking of ISIS is rather appropriate.
snippet: The murderous ways of the Islamic State are no joke, but the Italians’ mocking of ISIS is rather appropriate.
